properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 31 DEC
   BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG
   CABLE IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 01-18.87S 041-29.07W, 01-54.67S 041-18.33W,
      02-09.07S 041-29.13W, 01-54.45S 042-40.63W.
   B. 01-43.58S 042-56.80W, 01-43.83S 041-18.13W,
      02-05.45S 041-19.10W, 02-05.37S 042-04.72W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 12.
